creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: off-white thick paper, with Santa Claus image printed in black and graphic border image printed in yellow; rectangular image of linear silhouette of Santa Claus in sky behind a cottage in a snowy landscape with three very tall trees; graphic design of two radiating stars with snow; two banners with text above and below Santa Claus image: "Christmas Greetings...from the Holzschuhs"
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

URC on back, in pencil: [29a]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Christmas card illustration with linear silhouette of Santa Claus and cottage
